name: Cloneimals
overview: Though the government forbade it, the "company" secretly worked on cloning animals and plants to automatically control power equipment and machinery with artificial intelligence. The plants and animals got smart and now they are out to kill all humans. They have over run a mining colony they controlled. They have to be stopped from spreading across the solar system and killing other colonists. The government has refused to allow its' soldiers to get killed to clean up the "company's" mess. So, they have hired you to do their dirty work. Your mission, destroy as many Cloneimals as possible with the limited supplies allotted to you by the generous "company". You get a bonus for each Cloneimal destroyed because if the government comes in, the "company" gets charged for the dirty site cleanup. Your goal, make as much money as possible while staying alive
